metadata.title: CVE-2022-43705 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Botan before 2.19.3, it is possible to forge OCSP responses due to acertificate verification error. This issue was introduced in Botan 1.11.34(November 2016).

criterions.comment: botan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
